lines.text:
[on Travis Thorne]
... It's hard to believe that boy comes from these parts; he's driven by nothing but greed.

[on Tanglewood Forest]
... There's a hundred million board-feet of lumber up there, and I want it all... I couldn't care less about the progress of anyone except me.

[the Oath of Tanglewood Forest]
"We ask you to leave it pure as found; We are to it forever bound."
The only magic I believe in is that of the almighty dollar.
Meaning the only *dreams* you believe in are those you can buy.
